H0.text: who did taft defeated in 1908. William Howard Taft's opponent in the 1908 election

H1.text: who did taft defeated in 1908. William Jennings Bryan

H2.text: who did taft defeated in 1908. Alton B. Parker

H3.text: who did taft defeated in 1908. Theodore Roosevelt

A4.text: Republican Party nominee William Howard Taft defeated three-time Democratic nominee William Jennings Bryan.

A5.text: Incumbent President Theodore Roosevelt honored his promise not to seek a third term (for him, a second full term), and persuaded his close friend, Taft, to become his successor.
